properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
S/V ZEN DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO STEERING GEAR FAILURE
IN 16-00.4N 057-00.3W. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 4227 99024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 59 659 670 9292,
FAX: 59 659 663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
